qas.question: What category of products usually made from wood includes chairs?
What wooden utensil could you stir a pot of soup with?
Which parts of tools are sometimes made out of wood?
What pieces of furniture that most people use every night can be made out of wood?
What special wooden utensils do many people use to eat Chinese takeout?

context: Wood has always been used extensively for <a0_0>furniture<a0_0/>, such as chairs and <a3_0>beds<a3_0/>. It is also used for tool <a2_0>handles<a2_0/> and cutlery, such as <a4_0>chopsticks<a4_0/>, toothpicks, and other utensils, like the <a1_0>wooden spoon<a1_0/>.
